argSrc: Berlin's basketball team has just come out of a sobering season.
argTrg: Especially the home games have seen the team stay behind expectations.

argSrc: Berlin's basketball team has just come out of a sobering season.
argTrg: A sad highlight: Losing 60:87 to the weakish Mannheimers in a sold-out stadium.

argSrc: Berlin's basketball team has just come out of a sobering season.
argTrg: Indeed the team ended up third in the league,

argSrc: Berlin's basketball team has just come out of a sobering season.
argTrg: but given the cost of the star-players one could've expected more.
